bibl.title: Prosopographica IV
bibl.seg: Continued from: ArchPF 65 (2019) pp. 348-356. - 16. Callinicus, comes. - 17. Hermopolite Anatolii. - 18. Anonymus 73, scholasticus. - 19. Demeas, comes and ex-praeses, and others. - 20. Serenus, comes. - Pp. 95-101: Appendix. Two London Letters: 1. BL Pap. 1325. To Georgius from a 'brother'. Sixth century; - 2. BL Pap. 1069a. To Anatolius, comes, from Colluthus, exceptor. Early seventh century.
